channel.title: Need Help Making Client Into Jar For Hosting
channel.description:
i looked on youtube for videos but i cant seem to do it even with JARMaker. one video said something about a egui or egu file but i cant seem to find that either
please help. i will rank on my hosted server when its up!!!!!!!

item.title: Need Help Making Client Into Jar For Hosting
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

[quote=“Deathdomain, post:3, topic:482510”]still not working. all im trying to do is jar it so i can uploaded the jar file to a site so people can download and play my server while i have it running.

if u can help me skype me at Randy.Lee.Rason[/quote]

I’ll help.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Making Client Into Jar For Hosting
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

If you don’t already, make a separate folder and put only your class files in it, you do this so you don’t jar your java files making the jarred file smaller. Once you have done that, follow this video:


Except, put all of the files you make in your client folder. Like the certificate and the jarred client. Just to make easier to access since you’re already in your client folder.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help Making Client Into Jar For Hosting
